main.name: Gideon S Crawley
main.occupation: Full-Stack Engineer specializing in front-end web design.
main.description: I'm currently available for remote contract opportunities only
main.contactmessage: I'd love to hear from you!

education.school: Dominican University of California, San Francisco
education.description: I'm currently a full-time undergrad student at DU's Make School program, pursuing my Bachelor's degree in full-stack engineering. Make School prepares students for work in the Tech Industry by teaching us to work collaboratively, with a strong emphasis on Product Development and UX.
Majored in Analog Photography and Theater Arts.

work.company: Various temp, gig, and freelance roles
work.title: Web Developer / Musician / Delivery Driver
work.description: Supported myself playing music and working in the gig economy, delivering for Doordash, Caviar, Uber Eats.

work.company: SANS Consulting Services, Inc, New York City
work.title: Mid-level Technical Recruiter
work.description: Recruited IT professionals for major investment banks; performed extensive research, interviews and testing to find the right candidates qualified to match our clients' job requirements.

projects.title: Redux Tetris
projects.category: A simple Tetris grid puzzle game I built using React with Redux to map state. Hosted on Firebase and using Firebase API for User Authentication

testimonials.text: I’ve had the pleasure of working very closely with Gideon when he joined us at Sans Consulting. Gideon came into the industry very raw but was a fast learner and quickly became a key asset to our company in no time at all. Gideon has great work ethics and will do whatever it takes to get the job done. Any company would be lucky to have Gideon as a part of their team.
testimonials.user: Daniel Chechile, Talent Acquisition Manager @ SANS Consulting Services, Inc
